description:
In this film, the two Saiyans discuss the first three movies of Dragon Ball (Curse of the Blood Rubies, Sleeping Princess in Devil`s Castle, and Mystical Adventure) and the first seven of Dragon Ball Z (Dead Zone, The World`s Strongest, The Tree of Might, Lord Slug, Cooler`s Revenge, The Return of Cooler, and Super Android 13!).
In the end, Goku does not much like being all dressed up and powers up to change back into his regular martial arts uniform. Gohan tries to do like his father, but he is not powerful enough to get out of his tuxedo. Goku says he will get there someday, and Gohan tells everyone to be sure to go see Dragon Ball Z: Super Android 13! in theaters.

titles.title: Kyokugen Battle! Sandai Chou Saiyajin Special
Summer Vacation Special - Extreme Battle!! The Three Great Super Saiyans
極限バトル!! 三大超サイヤ人 スペシャル
